bill.title: As introduced, subject to local approval, rewrites charter. - Amends Chapter 714 of the Private Acts of 1937; Chapter 836 of the Private Acts of 1937; Chapter 61 of the Private Acts of 1943; Chapter 352 of the Private Acts of 1945; Chapter 601 of the Private Acts of 1945; Chapter 838 of the Private Acts of 1947; Chapter 929 of the Private Acts of 1949; Chapter 649 of the Private Acts of 1951; Chapter 273 of the Private Acts of 1976; Chapter 252 of the Private Acts of 1984; Chapter 32 of the Private Acts of 1987, and any other acts amendatory thereto.
